claim: Marc Maron hosted The Marc Maron Show.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Marcus David Maron  (  -LSB- ˈmærən -RSB- ; born September 27 , 1963  )  is an American stand-up comedian , podcaster , writer , actor , musician , director , and producer .

claim: Marc Maron hosted The Marc Maron Show.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He has been host of The Marc Maron Show and co-host of both Morning Sedition and Breakroom Live , all politically oriented shows produced by Air America Media .

claim: Marc Maron hosted The Marc Maron Show.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He hosted Comedy Central 's Short Attention Span Theater for a year , replacing Jon Stewart .

claim: Marc Maron hosted The Marc Maron Show.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Maron was a frequent guest on the Late Show with David Letterman and made more than forty appearances on Late Night with Conan O'Brien , more than any other standup performer .

claim: Marc Maron hosted The Marc Maron Show.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He was also a regular guest on Tough Crowd with Colin Quinn and hosted the short-lived American version of the British game show Never Mind the Buzzcocks on VH1 .

claim: Marc Maron hosted The Marc Maron Show.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In September 2009 , Maron began hosting a twice-weekly podcast titled WTF with Marc Maron in which he interviews comedians and celebrities .

claim: Marc Maron hosted The Marc Maron Show.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Highlights have included Conan O'Brien , Robin Williams , and an episode with Louis C.K. that was rated the # 1 podcast episode of all time by Slate magazine .

claim: Marc Maron hosted The Marc Maron Show.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In June 2015 , Maron interviewed the President of the United States , Barack Obama , at his podcast studio and home , in Highland Park , Los Angeles , California .

claim: Marc Maron hosted The Marc Maron Show.
premise_source_doc_sentence: From 2013 to 2016 , he starred in his own IFC television comedy series , Maron , for which he also served as executive producer and occasional writer .

claim: Marc Maron hosted The Marc Maron Show.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The Marc Maron Show was a late night radio show produced in affiliation with the Air America Radio network and hosted by comedian Marc Maron .

claim: Marc Maron hosted The Marc Maron Show.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Upon returning to California , Earl reunited with former Morning Sedition host , Marc Maron , on the Marc Maron Show , which premiered on Air America Radio on February 28 , 2006 , and had its last show on July 14 , 2006 .

claim: Marc Maron hosted The Marc Maron Show.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Unlike the other shows the two have done  (  The Majority Report , The Marc Maron Show  )  , no calls were taken ; however , the two did chat with viewers during and after the show via email and instant messaging .

claim: Marc Maron hosted The Marc Maron Show.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He has been host of The Marc Maron Show and co-host of both Morning Sedition and Breakroom Live , all politically oriented shows produced by Air America Media .

claim: Marc Maron hosted The Marc Maron Show.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Marc Maron and Sam Seder hosted the show from the actual break room at Air America Media in New York ; the show was evocative of past shows done by Maron and Seder on the network -- political commentary interspersed with comedic elements .
